annotations:
mv Stellar Alazani, 2014, 28,180 dwt, grd 4x30 ts  -  Douala 13-15
    Aug 

    mv Stellar Rioni, 2017, 38,230 dwt, box/logger, grd 4x30 ts -
    Jinzhou 24-29 Aug

    mv Stellar Indigo, 2017, 38,242 dwt, box/logger, grd 4x30 ts -
    employed

    mv Stellar Isabela, 2017, 37,993 dwt, box, A60, grd 4x30.5 ts -
    employed

    mv Stellar Enguri, 2012, 33,677 dwt, box, grd 4x30.5 ts -  employed

    mv Stellar Aragvi, 2014, 28,368 dwt, grd 4x30.5 ts - employed

    mv Stellar Ontario, 2014, 28,284 dwt, grd 4x30.7 ts -  employed



 

MV Stellar Indigo
      IMO : 9780316
      bulk carrier
      liberia flag, built 2017
      38,242 mt dwat on 10.028 m ssw
      loa/lbp/bm: 182.87m / 179.95m / 31m
      depth moulded :    14.5 m
      grt/nrt: 24655 / 12351
      grain/bale 49,759 / 48,621 cubm
      Ho/Ha :    5/5
      Hatch size :
       No.1 : 17.50 m X 19.10 m
       No.2 : 20.70 m X 22.70 m
       No.3 : 20.70 m X 22.70 m
       No.4 : 20.70 m X 22.70 m
       No.5 : 20.70 m X 22.70 m
      Type of hatch operation    : Hydraulic Operation

      Strengthened for heavy cargo
      4 x 30 mt electro-hydraulic cranes

      ABT 13,0KNOT (L) / ABT 13,5KNOT (B)
      ON ABT 21.5MT(L) / 20.5MT(B) IFO(380CST) PLUS 0,1MT MDO AT SEA
      (UNDER GOOD WHEATHER, BF UNDER 4, WAVE HEIGHT UNDER 1.9M)
      VSL HAS OPTION TO BURN MDO I/O IFO NARROW WATER, CANAL, RIVER,
      PORT-IN/OUT, ETC.
      IN PORT :(IDLE/WORK) ABT 3,0/4,5MT IFO PLUS 0,1MT MDO
      all abt, in ECA vsl to use mgo i/o ifo

      ECO SPEED/CONS(WOG/REF ONLY);
      B 11.0/L 10.5 ON 16.5 IFO + 0.1 MGO
      ada

      Hold #2:    15.05 MT/sq. m

      Ballast - about 13.5 knots on about 21.5mt IFO + 0.1MT MGO

      Eco Speed WOG/REF ONLY
      Laden - about 11.5 knots on about 16.5mt IFO + 0.1MT MGO
      Ballast - about 12.0 knots on about 16.5mt IFO + 0.1MT MGO

      all abt, in ECA vsl to use mgo i/o ifo
      ada
